remarks: Lemma for distributive law for positive reals.  (Contributed by NM, 2-May-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
distrlem4pr $p |- ( ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. /\ C e. P. ) /\ ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ( f e. A /\ z e. C ) ) ) -> ( ( x .Q y ) +Q ( f .Q z ) ) e. ( A .P. ( B +P. C ) ) ) $.
$d A f x y z $.
$d B f x y z $.
$d C f x y z $.
